text: aur kamazor log bade logon se kahenge (ki zabaradastee to nahin kee magar ham khud bhee gumaraah nahin hue) balki (tumhaaree) raat-din kee pharebadehee ne (gumaraah kiya ki) tum log hamako khuda na maanane aur usaka shareek thaharaane ka baraabar hukm dete rahe (to ham kya karate) aur jab ye log azaab ko (apanee onkhon se) dekh lenge to dil hee dil mein pachhataenge aur jo log kaaphir ho baithe ham unakee gardanon mein tauq daal denge jo kaarastaaniyaan ye log (duniya mein) karate the usee ke muvaaphiq to saza dee jaegee
